DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find out what effect, if any, Low Frequency Therapeutic Ultrasound (LOTUS) has on kidney function in patients with chronic kidney disease.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Low Frequency Ultrasound on Kidney Function
DOC.criteria: Must be >/= 18 years of age Must have documented Stage 3 to Stage 4 (eGFR 15 59) chronic kidney disease Females with childbearing potential must not be pregnant at the time of study Subject must provide written informed consent Unable or unwilling to cooperate with study procedures Currently enrolled in another clinical study for which the followup period is not complete
